source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: WAGARA Decorative Painting (Japanese Style)

visible_instructors.name: Michiko
visible_instructors.title: Michiko Ozawa
visible_instructors.job_title: Wagara Decorative Painter/和柄トールペイント講師

items.headline: WAGARA is Japanese classic patterns. I teach you my original technique to make WAGARA decorative painting.
objectives_summary: Learn decorative painting techniques and stencil techniques, and how to apply those techniques to WAGARA paintings.
Make three WAGARA painting projects.
Finally, make your original WAGARA designs.

items.title: Abstract Art Project "Fantasy Garden"
items.headline: 10 Steps To Planting and Growing Your Own Fantasy Garden
objectives_summary: Create your own "Fantasy Garden"

items.title: Paint my 2 FREE style watercolor paintings from Venice.

visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.title: David Walker
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor

items.headline: Learn how to paint my 2 FREE style watercolor paintings by following easy step by step lessons,for the beginner
objectives_summary: After taking this course the student will be more confident to strike out and do their own paintings

items.title: Sewing Pattern Alterations: Fixing Fit Issues
items.headline: This extensive course on pattern alterations will help improve many aspects of your sewing skills
objectives_summary: This sewing course provides the skills and techniques needed to make pattern alterations to fit your needs.
Alteration tips to fix common fit issues with sleeves.
Skirt & pant alterations to adjust for various sizing without changing the overall design.

items.title: Master Therapeutic Watercolor in 30 Days
items.headline: Learn the art of therapeutic watercolor painting — whether you're a total beginner or an experienced artist.
objectives_summary: Paint effortlessly with watercolors
Relax through watercolor painting
Create unique watercolor art

items.title: Foundational Hand Traditional Calligraphy
items.headline: Also known as Bookhand or the Formal Manuscript
objectives_summary: Use a parallel pen or reed pen for traditional Foundational Hand calligraphy
Lowercase & Uppercase letters, numbers and two simple projects

items.title: Expressionism Abstract Art Techniques with Acrylics
items.headline: Abstract Art Techniques with Acrylics using tools like brushes opposites
objectives_summary: Create your own painting in one lesson
Understanding Abstract Art
Where that art based on, famous Painters who start it, first Abstract Art movement

items.title: Watercolour for beginners #3
items.headline: An easy and fun course for the new-to-art and painting.
objectives_summary: Learn about the skills involved in painting a wash
Learn how to create shadows
Learn how easy watercolour can be

items.title: Paint this Mountain: Watercolor painting in 3 EASY steps
items.headline: Watercolor painting, easy & fun! I show you step-by-step how to paint this lovely Mountain Landscape. Beginners welcome!
objectives_summary: Paint a beautiful Mountain Landscape scene in watercolor, in as little as 30 minutes
Learn how to mix every color imaginable from a minimal color palette
Join a community of thousands of painters who have learned the joys and relaxation of watercolor painting

items.title: How to Punch Needle for Beginners
items.headline: Learn how to use thread and use a punch needle.
objectives_summary: Basic steps of Punch Needling.
Learn how to thread a punch needle.
Tips and Tricks

items.title: How to Sew Lounge or Pajama Pants
items.headline: Learn basic garment construction skills as you sew pajama pants that look and feel fabulous!
objectives_summary: How to work with a PDF pattern
How to sew Lounge Pants/Pajama Pants

items.title: How to Draw an Eye
items.headline: Learn to Draw with Photorealism
objectives_summary: To create a proportional sketch from scratch
To draw an eye that looks real
To create highlights and shadow with realism

items.title: How To Draw A Realistic Face Using Pencil For Beginners
items.headline: How To Draw Human Faces | Draw Photo Realistic Portraits | Sketch Facial Features & Learn To Shade Faces For Beginners
objectives_summary: Understand the fundamentals of drawing a realistic portrait
Know exactly which tools to use to improve your drawings
How to use a reference photo to draw a photo realistic face

items.title: Going 3D: Modular Origami - making unique decorations
items.headline: Learn to make both beautiful and practical models from a simple A4 paper sheet
objectives_summary: Make a desired 3D origami model out of the triangle modules - with modular origami you're not limited by set patterns
Fold a 3D origami triangle module out of a piece of paper
Select paper suitable for modular origami and effectively cut it into suitable size pieces

items.title: Paint a TROMPE L'OEIL. People will be AMAZED and SURPRISED.

visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Paint something really eye catching, impressive & with a real WOW factor. Improve how you paint shadows & create depth.
objectives_summary: Get to grips with the basic principals of how to paint the a 'trompe l'oeil' style.
All painting students will benefit from will learning more painting believable shadows.
Use it to paint fine art pictures or for home decoration.

items.title: Acrylic LANDSCAPE 'Bush Walk' with a Palette Knife. Level 2

visible_instructors.name: Gerald
visible_instructors.title: Gerald Ashcroft
visible_instructors.job_title: Landscape and Abstract Artist and Teacher

items.headline: Paint with more spontaneity and build your confidence as you paint this 'Bush Walk' landscape full of sunlight and depth
objectives_summary: How to hold and maneuver your palette knife to mix paint so that it becomes second nature to you
Laying out the colours on your palette in a consistent manner
Colour mixing exercise to introduce you to the colours you will use in the 'Bush Walk' landscape
